content: Are there any restrictions if I install zulip server locally? For example, is there any limit on the number of ldap users and the amount of information storage
@TwoDogs2: It's only limited by the size of your hard disk.
@Alex Vandiver Ok, thank you very muchï¼ŒBut I want to know the path where the data is stored. I read the instruction manual and it doesn't seem to explain
@Alex Vandiver Can you tell me where the data is stored by default
In the PostgreSQL database, which is in /var/lib/postgresql/*/main.
Separately, please respect our community guidelines and don't over-use @'s of core contributors.
TwoDogs2 has marked this topic as resolved.
